ch0040_00_hachiku/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Running into you is always a joy.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0101_0701_02_10:
Continue to train hard, my friend.
Seize the heart of justice!
ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_01_10:
There’s a Pokémon called Beartic that’s
native to my hometown in Unova.
It’s got sharp, icy claws and fangs...
ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_02_10:
which can appear quite intimidating
to most people! But my Beartic
is truly stout of heart, I must say.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_03_10:
I myself have gone on many a trek
through the snowiest mountains with
my Beartic to train.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_04_10:
His warm, furry mass has kept me from
freezing to death out there on
countless occasions.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_05_10:
Facing the harshest forces of nature
together with one’s Pokémon...
It’s all part of one’s training, in the end.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0702_01_10:
Pokémon help out their Trainers, and
Trainers help out their Pokémon.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0702_02_10:
Our mutual support is what gives us 
this incredible sync strength.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_01_10:
Did you know that Cryogonal’s body
is made up of frozen ice crystals?
ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_02_10:
If you touch one by accident,
be prepared to feel a freezing
-150 °F chill!
ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_03_10:
Then again, Cryogonal and I have undergone
intensive training to improve our sync strength,
so I’ve felt its freezing touch many times.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_04_10:
The fiery passion of our friendship
urges us to grow ever stronger!
ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0702_02_10:
Oh, not to worry! I’m sure I’m only sneezing
because I, uh... Because I always have
my shoulder exposed! Mm-hmm!
ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_01_10: Are you interested in films, child?
ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_02_10:
Pokéstar Studios back in Unova is the
heart of the movie industry, you know!
Our films are incredibly popular.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_03_10:
I’ve acted in lead roles in many
of them, of course.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_04_10:
The brilliance of those films and all the
performers involved deserves to be shared!
Watch them—feel the creators’ passion!
ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0702_01_10:
Did you know Pokéstar Studios utilizes
Pokémon talent in addition to us actors?
They add a whole new level to the narrative.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0702_02_10:
If any of this has piqued your interest,
I strongly recommend picking up a film
or two. I promise you won’t regret it.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0701_01_10:
I was once known as “the quiet one” or
“the strong, silent type,” but I have
come a long way since then.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0701_02_10:
I found that...I wanted people to know
how I was feeling. I didn’t want to be
misunderstood, so I began to speak up.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0701_03_10:
There are some things in life one simply
must put into words. You cannot expect
others to read your mind!
ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0702_01_10:
Traveling to Pasio and meeting you
will prove to be one of my life’s
greatest treasures.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0702_02_10:
It may sound grandiose, but it’s true.
In my heart, I consider every friend
I’ve ever met a priceless treasure.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_01_10:
For reasons I shan’t discuss now,
I once retired from my career
as an actor.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_02_10:
But, after some time had passed, the
Champion of the Unova region, Alder,
showed me a new path in life.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_03_10:
No matter how hard things get...even when
it feels as if the entire world is against
you, you will always have a path.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_04_10:
If you’re ever feeling lost, remember those words,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0702_01_10:
In teaching others, we learn a great
deal about ourselves.
ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0702_02_10:
Teaching and supporting you has taught
me a great deal indeed.
ch0040_00_hachiku/1701_0701_01_10: Here—a small token of our collaboration.
ch0040_00_hachiku/1701_0702_01_10: It feels good to give to others.
ch0040_00_hachiku/1701_0702_02_10:
Seeing the other person’s face light up
with joy alone is enough to make
it feel worthwhile.
ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_01_10:
Would you say I resemble Brycen-Man
at all? Don’t we look alike?
ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_02_10:
I’m referring to the star of the popular film 
Brycen-Man from Unova, of course.
ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_03_10:
What?! You’ve never heard of the
unstoppable Brycen-Man?!
Now that just simply won’t do!
ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_04_10:
Hmm... ... ...
I’ve got it! Let’s produce a new
Brycen-Man film here on Pasio!
ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_05_10:
You’ll act in the film as well, of course.
I insist!
ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0702_01_10:
Yes, child? You’re anxious
to start filming, you say?
ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0702_02_10:
Mwahaha! What a coincidence!
Me too!
ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0702_03_10:
After the PML is over, I’m sure our
schedules will be packed with filming!
ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_01_10:
Whenever I watch you battle, I’m
reminded of just how splendid it is to
witness someone grow.
ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_02_10:
The sight of both Trainer and Pokémon,
working together in earnest to improve
their skills...
ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_03_10:
The pair of you will achieve great
things in the near future. I can see it
plainly within you.
ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_04_10:
The journey ahead of you will by no
means be an easy one.
ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_05_10:
But remember that you have people
like me, rooting for your victory.
ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0702_01_10:
Strength doesn’t only come from within.
It comes from the people who believe in
you as well.
ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0702_02_10:
Remember to treasure your friends,
your Pokémon, and especially yourself.
ch0040_00_hachiku/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning to you! I see you’re starting
your training bright and early.
ch0040_00_hachiku/3002_0701_01_10:
A morning jog is a must for
building battle stamina.
ch0040_00_hachiku/3003_0701_01_10:
Good day. How goes it? I would be pleased to
join you in training, if you wish.
ch0040_00_hachiku/3004_0701_01_10:
Have you had lunch yet? You need to eat
properly to get the most from your training.
ch0040_00_hachiku/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening. If you are tired, you should rest.
No need to put on an act.
ch0040_00_hachiku/3006_0701_01_10:
I’m impressed to see you out so late.
Try not to lose too much sleep, all right?
